description: Raiden Mei is a Valkyrie in Honkai Impact 3rd. The daughter of the prominant Raiden Ryoma, she has beautiful and demure looks. This, combined with her mastery of Bushido and Itto-ryo, make her a true incarnation of silk hiding steel. She attends St. Freya Academy alongside Kiana and Bronya. She normally does not use the tremendous power within her... except when dire circumstances bring it forth.
name: Raiden Mei
